text: Sarkis Assadourian (; ; born 22 May 1948) is an Iranian fencer of Armenian descent.Arek Yapoudjian. Armenian Olympians: From Athens to Athens Trafford, 1 January 2007 (originally published by the University of Michigan, digitalised 11 Juli 2011) p 95 He competed in the individual and team épée and team foil events at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Bio Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Iran Category:Iranian Armenian people Category:Ethnic Armenian sportspeople Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Iran Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Iran Category:Asian Games medalists in fencing Category:Fencers at the 1974 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1974 Asian Games
title: Sarkis Assadourian (fencer)
